version_description: Майское настроение становится летним! Грядёт жаркая пора, а мы пока исправляем ошибки и делаем приложение ещё удобнее. Используйте промокод VPN и радуйте близких! ;)
Майское настроение становится летним! Грядёт жаркая пора, а мы пока исправляем ошибки и делаем приложение ещё удобнее. Используйте промокод VPN и радуйте близких! ;)

Если вы видите данное сообщение, значит вы — успешный человек и вашим близким повезло с вами! В новой версии мы улучшили каталог, добавили нижнее меню, перелопатили логику. В общем, готовимся к новой версии Flowwow 2.0! Скоро она выйдет, мы это сделаем!

Если вы видите данное сообщение, значит вы — успешный человек и вашим близким повезло с вами! В новой версии мы улучшили каталог, добавили нижнее меню, перелопатили логику. В общем, готовимся к новой версии Flowwow 2.0! Скоро она выйдет, мы это сделаем!

Если вы видите данное сообщение, значит вы — успешный человек и вашим близким повезло с вами! В новой версии встроили персонализацию для повторных покупок, улучшили внешний вид и удобство профиля, красивые подгрузки, ускорение работы. В общем, все идет к новой версии 2.0!

Если вы видите данное сообщение, значит вы — успешный человек и вашим близким повезло с вами! В новой версии встроили персонализацию для повторных покупок, улучшили внешний вид и удобство профиля, красивые подгрузки, ускорение работы. В общем, все идет к новой версии 2.0!

Кстати, теперь, после выполнения заказа мы спросим вас о свежести букета, работе курьера и магазина. Это позволит нам повысить качество и впредь радовать вас отличным качеством букетов.

Меняем понимание к покупкам цветов и дарим промокод на 3000 руб. А для ваших друзей вы можете делиться скидкой на 3500 руб. Радуйте себя и близких чаще, а мы позаботимся обо всем другом.

25 ноября — День Матери в России! Не забудьте поздравить самого родного человека. Мы торопились внедрить новую, удобную карточку товара с отзывами и другими полезностями. Они позволят выбрать именно тот товар, который вы ищете.

25 ноября — День Матери в России! Не забудьте поздравить самого родного человека. Мы торопились внедрить новую, удобную карточку товара с отзывами и другими полезностями. Они позволят выбрать именно тот товар, который вы ищете.
Мы внедрили новую, удобную карточку товара с отзывами и другими полезностями. Они позволят легко выбрать именно тот букет, который вы ищете!
Мы внедрили новую, удобную карточку товара с отзывами и другими полезностями. Они позволят легко выбрать именно тот букет, который вы ищете!

Version 2.0 is just the beginning! Next year we will make a lot of changes. We will be even better. Make your loved ones happier with technologies!

> Catalog critical bug fixed

Version 2.0 is just the beginning! Next year we will make a lot of changes. We will be even better. Make your loved ones happier with technologies!

Just try our last update!  You will find a new product catalog and this is only the first version of the improvements. You asked — we did it! Give us more feedback, and we will do even better.

Congratulate your darlings on February 14! Now it's even more convenient and easy! We added a new catalog screen and a smart data substitution system. Now the catalog is personalized. Improved order review screen. We have tried to do our best and hope for excellent ratings and your pleasure in using our application.

Congratulate your darlings on February 14! Now it's even more convenient and easy! We added a new catalog screen and a smart data substitution system. Now the catalog is personalized. Improved order review screen. We have tried to do our best and hope for excellent ratings and your pleasure in using our application.

- Favourites fix. You can tap on the heart icon on the product tile and it will be added to Favorites in the Profile section
- Added new tutorial for new users. It will help to understand the principles of application and it's functions.
- MIR payment system fix

It became even easier to make your loved ones happier with the flowers they like!
We've optimized our app and now it works equally fast either on top notch devices or on devices of the previous years!
Don't forget to share discounts with your friends. You can do this on the "Profile" screen in "Invite friends" section. They may get up to 3500 rubles discount on their order today.
But everything is depends on you here ;)

It became even easier to make your loved ones happier with the flowers they like!
We've optimized our app and now it works equally fast either on top notch devices or on devices of the previous years!
Don't forget to share discounts with your friends. You can do this on the "Profile" screen in "Invite friends" section. They may get up to 3500 rubles discount on their order today.
But everything is depends on you here ;)

We are continuing to improve and to speed up the application!
We are sure that time is a priceless resource and for this reason we are so thoroughly working on all the nuances. Try the new version to see it for yourself ;) Also we have made a new system for displaying information about the product in this version. A composition of the bouquet can be specified in grams.
And do not forget to share the discount with friends, because for every invited friend who ordered flowers - you will receive a gift for the next purchase.

We are continuing to improve and to speed up the application!
We are sure that time is a priceless resource and for this reason we are so thoroughly working on all the nuances. Try the new version to see it for yourself ;) Also we have made a new system for displaying information about the product in this version. A composition of the bouquet can be specified in grams.
And do not forget to share the discount with friends, because for every invited friend who ordered flowers - you will receive a gift for the next purchase.

It's hard to believe, but we made the app even faster! How? All because we value your time ;) But seriously, we have done a lot of work on several parts of the application, fixed some bugs and worked on optimization. Of course we are happy to remind you that you can get a discount on the purchase of bouquets. Just share your promocode with friends and get discounts for their completed orders. The promo code is always waiting for you on the “Profile” screen in the “Invite friends” section.

It's hard to believe, but we made the app even faster! How? All because we value your time ;) But seriously, we have done a lot of work on several parts of the application, fixed some bugs and worked on optimization. Of course we are happy to remind you that you can get a discount on the purchase of bouquets. Just share your promocode with friends and get discounts for their completed orders. The promo code is always waiting for you on the “Profile” screen in the “Invite friends” section.

We have finished working on the first part of chats optimisation. New message notifications can be received on any screen of the app. With new message badge you can immediately see how many unread messages you have. We have fixed some bugs and worked on optimisation, too.

We have finished working on the first part of chats optimisation. New message notifications can be received on any screen of the app. With new message badge you can immediately see how many unread messages you have. We have fixed some bugs and worked on optimisation, too.

Fixed the bug with order comment input
Restored the Pay the order button. Now it's works as it should
Added displaying of an additional items in "Order status" screen

Fixed the bug with order comment input
Restored the Pay the order button. Now it's works as it should
Added displaying of an additional items in "Order status" screen
We’ve made a redesign of chat rooms, now it will be even more convenient to communicate with the shop that executes your order! Also improved the stability of the app and fixed some minor bugs.
We’ve made a redesign of chat rooms, now it will be even more convenient to communicate with the shop that executes your order! Also improved the stability of the app and fixed some minor bugs.

What could be better than discount? Big discount! Now everything depends on you :)
Buy bouquets, invite friends and get bonus points. In the corner of each bouquet’s tile there is an icon with the amount of bonuses that you will receive for your purchase. Use the received bonuses as a discount for the next order or accumulate and receive a bouquet for 1 dollar. In this update we’ve added a reviews: in your profile you can see thanks and appreciation from the stores to you.

What could be better than discount? Big discount! Now everything depends on you :)
Buy bouquets, invite friends and get bonus points. In the corner of each bouquet’s tile there is an icon with the amount of bonuses that you will receive for your purchase. Use the received bonuses as a discount for the next order or accumulate and receive a bouquet for 1 dollar. In this update we’ve added a reviews: in your profile you can see thanks and appreciation from the stores to you.

Peonymania on Flowwow! All June, buy peonies with great prices and get twice as many bonuses. Bonuses can be accumulated to pay for the next order. Convenient banner in the catalog will help you to choose a bouquet of peonies just in a couple of clicks.

Peonymania on Flowwow! All June, buy peonies with great prices and get twice as many bonuses. Bonuses can be accumulated to pay for the next order. Convenient banner in the catalog will help you to choose a bouquet of peonies just in a couple of clicks.

Peonymania on Flowwow continues! Double bonuses for peonies are already waiting for you in the app. Choose your favorite bouquets, get bonuses and use them for the next purchase. In this version, we have restored the work of chats. Now nothing will prevent you from contacting the shop.

Peonymania on Flowwow continues! Double bonuses for peonies are already waiting for you in the app. Choose your favorite bouquets, get bonuses and use them for the next purchase. In this version, we have restored the work of chats. Now nothing will prevent you from contacting the shop.

Choose shop that you liked, and order from their assortment. This can be done on the “Shops” screen. For our regular users there is a special category. It includes stores in which you made an order and were satisfied with the quality of the bouquet. Users leave their opinion and evaluation of the shop. To see all reviews about the store, simply go to shop’s page and open reviews.

Choose shop that you liked, and order from their assortment. This can be done on the “Shops” screen. For our regular users there is a special category. It includes stores in which you made an order and were satisfied with the quality of the bouquet. Users leave their opinion and evaluation of the shop. To see all reviews about the store, simply go to shop’s page and open reviews.

This version has a label of proven shops by our Lime representatives. Also added a Fresh mark on products - bouquets collected no more than 1 hour ago and ready for delivery. Fixed annoying bugs that been missed in the previous version.

This version has a label of proven shops by our Lime representatives. Also added a Fresh mark on products - bouquets collected no more than 1 hour ago and ready for delivery. Fixed annoying bugs that been missed in the previous version.
Some users had problems with calculating the cost of the order, for this we have made a number of improvements. Now the total cost of the order is calculated correctly.
Some users had problems with calculating the cost of the order, for this we have made a number of improvements. Now the total cost of the order is calculated correctly.

In each version we strive to make the app more convenient for you. In this version, we’ve worked on the display of time, dates and currency. We hope that it will be much more convenient for you to choose the time of bouquet delivery! And we have double bonuses for wildflowers whole July;) Click on the banner on the main screen and choose a bouquet that will go to your loved one with all the warmth and positive emotions of the summer mood!

Thank you for your appreciation and high ratings! In this version, we’ve made important internal improvements for the convenience of clients, fixed some errors in the texts and corrected technical messages.

We made the section where you choose the delivery address and time even better. Make sure and write a review. We are interested to make our best for you!

Friday night, and we are releasing the app with an improved interface. Everything for our clients

We dedicated this update to improving our new "Collections" system and fixing some bugs to increase app stability, and we're hope that you'll keep supporting us like you were doing before. And don't forget to share promocode with friends to earn bonuses.

We dedicated this update to improving our new "Collections" system and fixing some bugs to increase app stability, and we're hope that you'll keep supporting us like you were doing before. And don't forget to share promocode with friends to earn bonuses.
Since this day you always will be notified about the rewards you get! Don't hesitate to spend them! Furthermore, we fixed the technical problems and now our service works even faster!

For your convenience, we organized the content and added its translation. Please, rate the app if you enjoy these changes and really like to give a nice present to your beloved one. Sincerely yours, the Flowwow team

What a pleasure! It's really awesome to see the orders that reveal the secrets! Check it out: the customer's review after the order completion, store's review about you and what items your receiver likes -  now you know what goods the person would like to get! All of these features are now available in a current release. Sincerely yours, Flowwow team

Mothers, grandmothers, wives, sisters, girlfriends, girls. On March 8, everyone must receive congratulations. And we will help to make it even more convenient, better and easier. You don't need to stand in lines, look for cash or go somewhere. Also another 95 thousand recipients compiled their Wish lists, and now you can find out what they want to get. Come in, take a look.

We've added a new option "No-contact delivery". The courier will arrive at the address, leave the package with the order near the door, step away 3 meters and contact the recipient to pick up the order. After that he will go further to bring joy to people. With great care for our most beloved customers, the Flowwow team.

We've added a new option "No-contact delivery". The courier will arrive at the address, leave the package with the order near the door, step away 3 meters and contact the recipient to pick up the order. After that he will go further to bring joy to people. With great care for our most beloved customers, the Flowwow team.

Tough times these days. But you can give a smile to a loved one. On Flowwow there is a new option, "No-contact delivery". The courier will arrive at the address, deliver the package with the an order next to a door, step away 3 meters and contact the recipient. Remember, flowers do not carry viruses, but give joy and smiles. With love, Flowwow team.

Yay! New filters added in the shops section. Now it’s easier to find a shop with the needed item. We also released a new loyalty program - WowPass. You can apply bonuses and discounts to all shops participating in this program, and shops have the opportunity to attract your attention with increased bonuses ;-)
With lots of love, your Flowwow team.

Yay! New filters added in the shops section. Now it’s easier to find a shop with the needed item. We also released a new loyalty program - WowPass. You can apply bonuses and discounts to all shops participating in this program, and shops have the opportunity to attract your attention with increased bonuses ;-)
With lots of love, your Flowwow team.

So we decided to celebrate 10k reviews for the app with guys. They took a pizza, Leo from delivery and as a result, instead of a bar, they made a new release with an address widget. We argued with Leo that the LEONID promocode for the first order and a discount of $5 will not collect more then 100 uses. Apply the WowPass filter, it will show you all shops where this discount can be applied. Always yours, iOS app developers, mic drop.

In the Russian Empire, Valentine's Day was trendy among the nobility. We found out when we were preparing the text for release. For the last 2 weeks, we have been working to make it even more convenient for you to order cakes, flowers, and gifts for your loved ones. With love to you, the Flowwow team.

-Good afternoon, I need a bouquet, but there is a problem: I do not know where the girl is. There is only a phone number.

-It's all right. We will deliver the order by phone number. You specify your name and number in the order, we will find out the address, and then you will receive a delivery invoice.

-Oh, my! Thanks! Then give me this bouquet…
